lines.text: Hey, Mister. I'm homeless and hungry. Could you spare a dollar so I can get a burger and a cup of coffee?
Okay, I got one dollar left. You can have it.
Could you spare another dollar or a quarter so I can get dessert too?
Hey, you better get away from me or I'll give you a pair of knuckles for desert! Now beat it!
Frankie, you always seem to show up at the most opportune time, don't you?
So it seems John. So it seems.
[Alexandria appears behind Frankie pointing a gun]
Hey, you know Frankie, there's a woman behind you pointing a gun. If you don't give me your gun, I assure you that she will put a hole right through you.
Is it true what they say about Chinese girls?
